cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.HC, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses the use of Markov decision processes (MDP) for recommender systems, which is a topic that falls under the sub-category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the use of predictive models for generating the initial MDP, which falls under the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the evaluation of the predictive model on real data, which falls under the sub-category of information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also discusses the use of the MDP-based recommender system in practice, which falls under the sub-categories of human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and social and information networks (cs.SI).
